name: Grupa Marcova Polska Electro sp. z o.o. sp. k.
goal: GMP Defence, as a part of Grupa Marcova Polska Electro sp. z o.o. sp. k., is a technology integrator of advanced protection systems (autonomous drones, anti-drone systems, ground-based radars and access control systems), present in 10 countries of Central and Eastern Europe.
interests: Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Drones, unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs), remotely piloted aircraft systems (RPAS), civil aviation, European Union Aviation Safety Agency
